text: According to the Authority, increasing the price of white sugar is a violation of the CAA Act.The CAA has informed the Essential Goods Importers Association in this regard and requires prior permission if the price is to be increased.Consumer Affairs Authority urged strict action against traders who increase the price of white sugar. According to the Authority, increasing the price of white sugar is a violation of the CAA Act.The CAA has informed the Essential Goods Importers Association in this regard and requires prior permission if the price is to be increased.
title: Strict action against traders increasing sugar price
